price: We did not find most of them committed to their covenant; rather We found most of them rebellious.
arabic: وَمَا وَجَدۡنَا لِأَكۡثَرِهِم مِّنۡ عَهۡدٖۖ وَإِن وَجَدۡنَآ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَفَٰسِقِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
